labels.analysis: The FinanceMCP Server is primarily focused on providing comprehensive financial data access and analysis capabilities. It offers real-time and historical financial data across multiple asset classes (stocks, funds, bonds, etc.), macroeconomic indicators, company performance metrics, and financial news. The server enables intelligent financial queries and combined data analysis through its MCP integration, making it a powerful tool for financial research, analysis, and decision-making.
labels.reasoning: The primary financial data and analysis capabilities justify the "Financial Services" as the main category. The server's extensive market data access across different asset classes and its news-gathering capabilities also align with "Web Search & Research" and "Data Analysis & Processing".

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: FinanceMCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @guangxiangdebizi/finance-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide comprehensive real-time financial data access and multi-dimensional financial analysis for language models. Support global stock markets, funds, bonds, macroeconomic indicators, financial news, and company performance data. Enable intelligent financial queries and combined data analysis through seamless MCP integration.

tools.name: current_timestamp
tools.description: Deploy Server FinanceMCP Server @guangxiangdebizi/finance-mcp Try in Playground current_timestamp

tools.name: finance_news
tools.description: 通过真正的搜索API获取主流财经媒体的新闻内容，支持单个或多个关键词智能搜索

tools.name: stock_data
tools.description: 获取指定股票的历史行情数据，支持A股、美股、港股、外汇、期货、基金、债券逆回购、可转债、期权

tools.name: index_data
tools.description: 获取指定股票指数的数据，例如上证指数、深证成指等

tools.name: macro_econ
tools.description: 获取宏观经济数据，包括Shibor利率、LPR利率、GDP、CPI、PPI、货币供应量、PMI、社融数据、Shibor报价、Libor、Hibor等

tools.name: company_performance
tools.description: 获取上市公司综合表现数据，包括业绩预告、业绩快报、财务指标、分红送股、主营业务构成、股东变动数据、管理层信息、公司基本信息、资产负债表、现金流量表、利润表等完整财务报表数据

tools.name: fund_data
tools.description: 获取公募基金全面数据，包括基金列表、基金经理、基金净值、基金分红、基金持仓等数据。

tools.name: fund_manager_by_name
tools.description: 根据基金经理姓名查询基金经理详细信息，包括管理的基金列表、个人背景、任职经历等

tools.name: convertible_bond
tools.description: 获取可转债非行情数据，支持两种查询方式：1)使用issue类型按时间范围查询可转债发行数据；2)使用info类型按代码查询可转债详细信息

tools.name: block_trade
tools.description: 获取大宗交易数据，包括成交价格、成交量、买卖双方营业部等详细信息

tools.name: money_flow
tools.description: 获取个股和大盘资金流向数据，包括主力资金、超大单、大单、中单、小单的净流入净额和净占比数据

tools.name: margin_trade
tools.description: 获取融资融券相关数据，支持多种数据类型：标的股票、交易汇总、交易明细、转融券汇总等

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@guangxiangdebizi/finance-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
